%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Start of Title Page

\thispagestyle{empty}  % Remove page numbering for the title page
\vspace*{-18mm}  % Adjust top margin

% Logo for the title page
\begin{center}
    \includegraphics[height = 3cm]{$assetpath$/AAGI_logo}
\end{center}

\vspace{35mm}

% Title Page Content
\begin{flushright}
    \HRule\\[5mm]  % Horizontal rule separator

    % Report Series and Title in custom color and font styles
    \Huge
    \textcolor{AAGI}{\textsf{\textbf{$report-series$}}}\\[6mm]
    {\textsf{\textbf{$title$}}}\\

    % Subtitle in smaller font size
    \Large
    \vspace{2mm}{\textsf{\textbf{$subtitle$}}}\\[5mm]

    % Author(s) Information
    \sf\normalsize
    $for(author)$
        \textsf{$author$}\\
    $endfor$
    $job-title$  % Job title (if provided)
    $address$    % Address (if provided)
    \vspace*{0.4cm}

    % Email (if provided)
    $if(email)$
        email:\;$email$\\[8mm]
    $endif$

    % Date of the report
    $date$
    \HRule  % Bottom separator
\end{flushright}

\vfill  % Vertically align content

% Partner Logo or Alternative Partner Graphics
$if(partner-logo)$
    \begin{tabular}{cl}
        \noindent\makebox[\textwidth]{\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth, height=3cm]{$assetpath$/Project_partner}}
        \makebox[0pt][r]{%
            \raisebox{2.0em}{%
                \includegraphics[height=1.2cm]{$partner-logo$}
            }\hspace*{-2.5em}
        }
    \end{tabular}
$else$
    \noindent\makebox[\textwidth]{\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth]{$assetpath$/Partners}}
$endif$

\vspace*{-22mm}  % Adjust vertical spacing

% Table spacing adjustment
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{6pt}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% End of Title Page

\clearpage  % Start content on a new page

% Front Matter Section (if applicable)
$if(has-frontmatter)$
    \frontmatter
$endif$

% Set the page counter to 1 after the title page
\setcounter{page}{1}

% Define custom heading styles
\sectionfont{\fontsize{20}{20}\selectfont}  % Level 1 headings: 20pt font size
\subsectionfont{\fontsize{16}{16}\selectfont}  % Level 2 headings: 16pt font size
\subsubsectionfont{\fontsize{14}{14}\selectfont\normalfont}  % Level 3 headings: 14pt font size, normal font
